multipleSources.title: Successfully ordered - ATTENTION - split into several packages!
multipleSources.info:
We are currently moving our archive. The originals you ordered are located in different locations and will therefore be sent split in different packages. You have no extra costs for the additional package(s). The packages and their content are split already in the overview list below and you will receive a separate tracking link for each of them by e-mail.
Thank you for your understanding,
Your CAYA Team

returns.title: Delivery Originals

openReturn.noDocuments: No originals included in your next delivery yet.
openReturn.nextReturnAt: The originals listed here are automatically sent to you free of charge (within Germany) after the {{date}}. Processing can take up to 20 working days.
openReturn.nextReturnAtInfo: A delivery of originals required urgently can be selected and ordered afterward by clicking the blue "Request delivery now" button.
openReturn.selectDocsTitle: The chosen originals will be ordered by clicking on Â«request delivery nowÂ».
openReturn.selectDocsInfo: You can order up to {{maxCount}} originals per immediate delivery. Currently selected:

returns.openReturnsTitle: Choose originals for your next delivery:

account.name: Name
account.talkToCustomerSupportInfo: If you change your e-mail address, please make sure that the spelling is correct, because registration will only be possible with the new email address. If you have any problems, please check our Help Center or write to us at hello@getcaya.com.

cancelPlanModal.line1:
Hello {{customerName}},

this is how your cancellation process will look like:
cancelPlanModal.bullet1: Your contract can be terminated on {{endDate}}.
cancelPlanModal.bullet2: 14 days before this date, we will cancel the forwarding orders that you have ordered via CAYA, so that no further mail arrives. If you want to cancel forwarding orders earlier, you can do this in 'Settings > Incoming mail'. If you have placed other forwarding orders yourself or have given the CAYA Postbox address to others, please inform your business / correspondence partners well beforehand.
cancelPlanModal.bullet3: 14 days after the above date, your last automatic bulk delivery will be initiated. The dispatch of this bulk delivery will then be carried out within 20 working days. If you have a plan that does not include free bulk deliveries, you will not be entitled to any  after cancellation. You can request the documents via immediate delivery for a fee.
cancelPlanModal.bullet4: Your CAYA account will remain active even after your cancellation so that you can continue to access your data. As a gesture of goodwill, we will scan letters arriving shortly after your cancellation and provide them to you in the CAYA platform. Letters arriving after this period will not be accepted. Incoming originals can still be ordered for a fee. Please make sure that no further letters are received by us.
cancelPlanModal.line2:
Before you cancel your contract with us, we would like to thank you for your trust and our cooperation. We hope that your time with an empty mailbox has given you the freedom and time in everyday life that you expected from us. We look forward to winning you back as a customer soon.

Thank you
Your CAYA Team

account.cancellationError: There was an issue with cancelling your subscription, please try again.

cancellationBanner.title: Questions about functions or your contract?
cancellationBanner.line1: We are happy to help you
cancellationBanner.line2: If you have any questions concerning your contract we are happy to assist you. Simply reach out to our friendly customer experience team via email - if you wish, also leave your phone number. You can reach us anytime via hello@getcaya.com.
cancellationBanner.line3: Your current contract runs until {{endDate}}. It is a contract that can be terminated {{billingPeriod}}. 14 days before the end of the term, the contract is automatically extended by {{extensionTime}}.
cancellationBanner.cancelAccountQuestion: Questions about the duration of the contract or termination?

preCancellationModal.subHeading: We are sorry to lose you as a customer. We would be pleased if you would give us another chance. If you email us, we will do our best to solve your issue to your satisfaction.

returns.address: Where should we send your originals?

scheduled.title: When and how often do you want to receive your originals?
scheduled.auto:
Depending on your plan you have access to the regular delivery of your original documents.

The regular delivery of your original documents only contains the documents you have manually chosen. Please keep your delivery address always up-to-date. Please be aware that for deliveries abroad extra postage fees may apply.

returns.documentsForShipment: Always add all received originals to the next free (within Germany) delivery of originals.
returns.delivery: Deadline for the selection of originals
returns.nextDelivery: Until the following date you can add original documents to you next delivery. After this date, the chosen documents are being prepared for dispatch. Please note that the actual date of dispatch may be up to 20 days after the deadline.

reachedLimit.title: A periodic, free delivery is not included in your plan.

returns.additionalInfo:
Depending on your plan you have access to the free regular delivery of your original documents.
Urgent documents can be requested immediately at any time for a fee under the menu item "Delivery Originals".

sources.addressHeader: How do we receive your postal mail?

caya.title: Your CAYA postal address
caya.additionalInfo:
You can use this address as a postal address for authorities and contractual partners.
Attention: Please do not use this address to set up your own mail forwarding order! Deutsche Post cannot process independently booked mail forwarding orders to this address. Please order through CAYA instead (see below).

sources.sourcesHeader: Your Subscriptions for Mail Forwarding Orders
sources.additionalInfo: When ordering, we set up mail forwardings on your behalf at Deutsche Post and (for Berlin addresses) at PIN MAIL for a fee. The setup of the forwarding can take up to 10 working days. Your mail forwarding will be renewed by us for a fee each year, unless you cancelled our service before. For mail forwardings the general terms and conditions of the respective service providers apply (see below). In case you cancel the mail forwarding we're not able to guarantee a refund. Please note that mail delivery may be delayed due to a mail forwarding. Preferably use your CAYA Postbox address for communication with communication partners. Terms and Conditions Deutsche Post AG: https://shop.deutschepost.de/shop/agb/AGB_Deutsche_Post_Shop.pdf â€“ Terms and Conditions PIN MAIL AG: https://www.pin-ag.de/sites/default/files/flyerbroschuren/agb/pin_mail_ag_agb_nachsendeauftrag_112017.pdf

reachedLimit.title: To add further mail forwarding orders, please upgrade your plan.

cancelPrompt.title: Do you wish to cancel the mail forwarding order prematurely?
cancelPrompt.content: Attention: The cancellation of a mail forwarding order cannot be reversed. For the renewed setup of a mail forwarding order costs will be incurred according to the price list. If you are unsure whether you wish to cancel this mail forwarding order or have any questions, please contact us in advance at hello@getcaya.com

cancelExtensionPrompt.title: Are you sure we shouldn't renew your postal forwarding?
cancelExtensionPrompt.content: Attention: You cannot undo this cancellation / non-renewal order. Without an active forwarding, your postal mail will only reach us if your correspondents have your CAYA Postbox address or if you set up another forwarding order.

cayaEmail.title: PDF upload email address
cayaEmail.additionalInfo: Use this email address to forward important PDF documents from your email and save, pay, edit, secure them in CAYA. CAYA is your place for your documents. Limit PDF file size approx. 24MB / No restriction on senders / Forward this address e.g. to receive invoices, but note: only the PDF attachments will be uploaded to your CAYA inbox, text and other content of the emails will not.

noPaymentMethod.title: You have not yet configured your payment method

setupDestinationModal.info: Where can I find the email address? What do I have to consider?
setupDestinationModal.integrationInfoHelp: Where can I find the email address? (To the step-by-step instructions)

active.title: Active integrations
active.subTitle: You can share single documents directly from CAYA to these tools. The sharing process happens through email forwarding to the import email address you have set up.
active.emptyList: You don't have any integrations set up yet.

all.title: Set up new integration
all.subTitle:
Set up an integration. Simply choose an integration to start. 

By the way: You can find all possible integrations with a detailed description as well as a step-by-step instruction for the setup in our

team.title: Share access to CAYA with your team
team.subtitle:
Admin users have full access to your CAYA account and all documents in it. 
Member users only have access to documents you share with them explicitely. 
All charges are billed to the owner's account.

hero.title: Your docs live in CAYA- your team should also live here
hero.subtitle: Invite new users. Share the power!

oldPlan.title: You are running an old plan
oldPlan.subtitle: Please upgrade your plan in order to use the latest features.

errors.upgradeFailed: Unfortunately something went wrong with your upgrade, please retry or contact customer support.

featureBox.title: Automagic Workflows
featureBox.subtitle: CAYA turns your "document management" into "automagic document workflows". We just took documents to the next level. Currently we are only setting up these document automations with key accounts willing to collaborate closely. We build with you powerfull automation recipes for your workflows and connect them with you favorite tools. So e.g. you can push documents with certain keywords into shared CAYA folder or into your necessary other tool(s). If you have >100 documents a month with us and want to join our BETA, please contact your Customer Success agent or us via hello@getcaya.com

isNew.title: Automagic BETA - We turn document management into automagic document workflows
isNew.description: During this BETA don't be shy and feel free to try everything. Please let us know what you like and what is missing. But oirst and foremost: Have fun! Make your life easier ;-)

STANDARD_WORKFLOW.title: Standard Workflows
STANDARD_WORKFLOW.subtitle: Connect your Caya account to our "Workflows" feature. Then select powerful automation recipes from our "Standard Workflows" overview and thereby connect Caya to your favourite tools.  Let your Caya account start working for you. \n If you process a lot of documents and therefore have requests for unusual automations, feel free to contact our Customer Success staff at hello@getcaya.com with the keyword "Custom Workflows". \n But for now, have fun testing our BETA.

CUSTOM_WORKFLOW_EXPERT.title: Workflow Editor for Experts
CUSTOM_WORKFLOW_EXPERT.subtitle: Our simple "if this then that" logics of the standard workflows can be extended quite a bit here. Hundreds of integrations and its own workflow editor allow you to create your own automation recipes. But beware! Executed automation steps cause us (and then you) additional costs. So create recipes that have no risk of "vicious circles" by adding a tag at the end that acts as an exclusion criterion for your recipe.

NONE.title: Workflows
NONE.subtitle:
"When a document arrives with the sender (A) and the keyword "Invoice", please automatically move it to the Accounting folder." \n
Such automations of previously manual work steps are made possible by our standard workflows feature. \n
The feature is available free of charge until 01.09.2022. Please try it out and give us your feedback.

banner.headline: Workflows are available in free BETA until 01.09.2022. After that, the function will only be available in Standard & Professional plans or for customers who book "Custom Workflows" via Customer Success.
banner.description: You can only incur additional costs after the BETA phase. Until then, everything is free of charge. We will also not automatically upgrade you, but simply deactivate the function for all those users who do not have a Standard or Professional plan. So please go ahead and test the automation of your standard workflows to the fullest as long as you can.

step1.title: Please check the payment details carefully in advance.
step1.sub: We cannot be held liable for incorrect bank transfers.

step2.title: Log in to your own online banking to transfer money.
step2.sub: We offer this function in cooperation with FinTecSystems GmbH. FinTecSystems GmbH is a payment institution regulated by the German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority (BaFin).

step3.title: Confirm your payment as usual via TAN.
step3.sub: Your bank decides which TAN procedure to use. Neither CAYA nor FinTecSystems store your online banking access credentials.

paymentConsent.acceptTermsTitle: I wish to use CAYA Pay Now at my own risk.
paymentConsent.acceptTermsSub: I am aware that I need to check every single payment order for completeness and correctness, since payment transfers can no longer be revoked after their confirmation via TAN.

header.title: CAYA is worth it!
header.text: Once your friends pay their first CAYA invoice, you'll get 10â‚¬ credited.

block1.title: Send out your invitation and coupon
block1.text: Simply press the blue "copy" button above. We already wrote a little invitation for you...

block2.title: Your friends first month is on us
block2.text: If your friends use your coupon code during sign-up then they will not pay for their first month of using CAYA

block3.title: 10â‚¬ credit for you
block3.text: Once your referral has paid their first invoice we will automatically credit your account with 10â‚¬.

referAFriend.clipboardText:
Take a look at CAYA: caya.link/raf !

With it you can receive and process your postal mail digitally online. I use it already and can't imagine life without it anymore. If you enter the code " {{voucherCode}} " during registration, you can use CAYA for free for one month. 

Try it it's great!

returns.label: Questions about the delivery of originals?
returns.subLabelStart: We answered the most common questions in our

account1.subLabelStart: We answered the most common questions in our

account2.label: Questions about your account settings?
account2.subLabelStart: We answered the most common questions in our

originals.label: Here you can find an overview of all your originals!
originals.subLabel: You decide what is going to happen to your documents.

paywallNotice.title: No reliable payment method / temporarily blocked
paywallNotice.paragraph1: Please provide a credit card as a payment method.
paywallNotice.paragraph2: Then send us a short email to hello@getcaya.com so that we can withdraw all outstanding amounts. We will then unlock you again.
paywallNotice.paragraph3: If necessary, you can also use PayPal or a direct debit (SEPA) as payment method. However, the activation of the account will then take significantly longer.

paywallNoticeContract.title: This document arrived without you being a CAYA Customer
paywallNoticeContract.paragraph1: It arrived either one month after your cancelation or while you are using a free testing account - that is out of our grace period and since you did not pay for the scan we will understandably not show it nor allow you to download it.
paywallNoticeContract.paragraph2: What can you do now? Please let the person who sent that letter and all others know, that your CAYA postbox is inactive and order you documents home via "Delivery of Originals". Alternatively you can also become a CAYA customer by clicking "Upgrade".

shreddingModal.error: Something went wrong, please reload the page and try again.

point1.title: Original documents will be destroyed after 91 days
point1.body: From 1 May 2020, all originals that have been received 91 days or more ago will be destroyed automatically and in compliance with data protection regulations. From now on, this process takes place continuously. This is only about the physical originals. The digital scan will of course remain in your CAYA account.

point2.title: Manage and return originals
point2.body2: you can work through all of your originals now and in the future to add them to the next regular bulk shipment (if included in the tariff) if desired. In the case of tariffs without a regular bulk shipment (minimalist, go, business), the documents must be requested by means of an immediate shipment before the destruction date.

point3.title: Please check that your delivery address is up to date
point3.body: Before your next regular return, please always check whether your stored delivery address is still current. If your tariff includes a regular return of documents, please note the following: We will not destroy documents that you have already selected for your next regular delivery, even if the planned shipping date is after the planned destruction date. The destruction of these documents will not be done until the bulk shipment is dispatched.

teamMemberCard.header: You are part of a team

successModal.paragraph: "Members" cannot look into your account. They have their own separate account and can only see the files and folders that you explicitly shared with them. You manage the access of your "Members". Meaning if you deactivate a member's account, they will lose access to all documents shared in CAYA with them.

banner.description: After that date this feature will become only available in our Standard & Professional plans. We will inform you soon what you need to do to continue using Workflows after this BETA launch period. With this Beta you are not agreeing to additional costs nor an upgrade. This choice will be yours after the BETA. If you already know you want to keep our workflows automagic, then contact us how to upgrade. (If you are already in our Standard or Professional plans then the feature will simply stay switched on.)
banner.headline: Workflows is in free Beta until September 1, 2022 for everyone!

activation-modal.description:
Choose from powerful automation recipes from our library and connect with your favorite tools with ease. We want to give you the chance to find out how Workflows can simplify your life.
We welcome your feedback and ideas on how to make your document management smarter.
activation-modal.terms-of-use: By clicking "Explore Workflows" feature, you agree that we share certain data with our automation partner Workato and with the the integrations you choose to setup workflows with. Our Workato product is running in a EU data center. You can find the Terms of Use you agree to with Workato here: <0>Terms of Use</0>
activation-modal.title: Youâ€™re invited to join the Workflows BETA for free
activation-modal.activation-error: Oops!... Something went wrong while trying to accept Workflows terms and conditions. Please reload or try again later.

beta.badgeTooltip:
Try out our Standard Workflows! We add automagic to your documents! \n
Our automagic Standard Workflows will be free of charge until 1st of September. Then the BETA ends. \n
After that, the function will only be available in Standard & Professional plans or for customers who book "Custom Workflows" via Customer Success.

connectionCard.alert: Establish permanent connection via login so your workflows can work

renameModal.title: Rename Workflow
renameModal.label: Workflow Name
renameModal.placeholder: A unique name helps to identify the workflow

connectionsTab.header: Manage permanent access to necessary connections for workflows
connectionsTab.subheader:
Please don't be surprised: You have to log in to your Caya account again here. After that, the system can only work.
Other necessary connections to tools other than Caya will also be set up here. However, you start this process in the "Standard Workflows" overview. \n
Please click on the "Connect" and "Inactive Connections" buttons and establish the connections to the respective accounts. \n
For your information: \n
Here you manage all the access rights necessary for your automations. If the access data to Caya and the other necessary software is not currently stored here, we cannot automate anything. Your access data is stored for us in a so-called "black box", i.e. this access data is completely inaccessible to us and encrypted on a European server, so we cannot see it.

exploreBanner.description: Select workflows from the library and boost your productivity

workflows-screen.title: Your created workflows (please press "Start" to activate them)

connections-screen.header: Permanent connections to your apps & accounts are needed so your automations can be executed
connections-screen.subheader:
Please don't be surprised: You have to log in to your Caya account again here. After that, the system can only work.
Other necessary connections to tools other than Caya will also be set up here. However, you start this process in the "Standard Workflows" overview. \n
Please click on the "Connect" and "Inactive Connections" buttons and establish the connections to the respective accounts. \n
For your information: \n
Here you manage all the access rights necessary for your automations. If the access data to Caya and the other necessary software is not currently stored here, we cannot automate anything. Your access data is stored for us in a so-called "black box", i.e. this access data is completely inaccessible to us and encrypted on a European server, so we cannot see it.
connections-screen.caya-auto-connection-modal: Please login into your Caya account (here again). Our automation plattform needs access to your Caya account and you need to give it by clicking "connect" and loging in with your Caya credentials.

explore-screen.error: Oops, something went wrong. Reload the page?

banner.header: Here you can explore our "Standard Workflows".\nThis library will continue to grow...
banner.description:
We divide "Standard Workflows" into three parts:\n
(1) Automatically upload PDF documents from other tools to Caya's inbox - "Automatic Upload to Caya inbox"\n
(2) Distribute PDF documents from Caya to other tools - "Automatic Distribution to the Outside"\n
(3) Move documents within Caya - "Automatic Distribution Internally"\n
We'll be adding more workflows soon. Today you can discover and set up the following smart automations here:

errors.GENERAL_ERROR: Unhandled error might be network... Reload the page and retry might work.
errors.INVALID_APPLICATION: Given application connection name is not supported.
errors.FAll_BACK: Oops... something went wrong while trying to create a workflow.

connections.title: The following connections are needed:
connections.subtitle: If a necessary connection still has to be created for the first time, you will be redirected to the connections page to do so and later continue here again. Click on your connection using the arrows on the right:

modal.title: You are creating a new connection
modal.label: Name of the connection

help.description: If you want to change the name of your connection at a later point you can do so ðŸ˜‰

next.headline: What happens next?
next.description:
You will now be redirected to the `Connections` page where you will have to sign in to the provider you want to connect to. 
After setting the 'Connection' up you will have to come back here to set up this Workflow again, you will then be able to select the connection you just created. We are sorry for this back and forth, it is a temporary inconvenience. We are working on a better solution.

parameters.title: Create the workflow parameters
parameters.subtitle:
Not all workflows require parameters other than the correct connections. \n 
If further parameters are needed, configure them here. \n 
Then press "Create workflow" and finally start the configured workflow under "Active workflows".

connections.title: Active Connections
connections.subtitle: The apps you need to setup & connect for this workflow:

banner.headline: If you update the Connection, please remember to edit the workflow you want it used in or setup a new workflow with it.
banner.description: The permanent access to third party services necessary for your autmations in 'Active Connections'

rebrandLaunch.paragraph1: We make your everyday life paperless, that's our roots and we are happy to simplify the lives of our customers. And at the same time, the Caya Document Cloud can do so much more by now!
rebrandLaunch.paragraph2: Caya has become the central document cockpit for many of our customers.
rebrandLaunch.bullet1: Documents come alive with us and can be organized, processed and even paid for quickly.
rebrandLaunch.bullet2: You can map processes in the archive in Caya and collaborate with multiple people on these folders and documents.
rebrandLaunch.bullet3: World-class OCR and data recognition provide unparalleled insight into documents (even without opening them) and is now becoming the basis for true automation.
rebrandLaunch.bullet4: Starting today, we'll begin enabling you to automate steps in your standard workflows. More info on that coming soon.
rebrandLaunch.paragraph3: We want to reflect the great development of the Caya Document Cloud with our new brand identity. We want to convey the joy we have in taking real work off our customers' shoulders.
rebrandLaunch.paragraph4: Thank you very much for our relationship so far! We hope you like our new website as much as we do. Please take a look at our new website at <0>caya.com/de</0>. We are extremely excited to hear your feedback! For us, the new Caya is true Automagic!
